Paragraph: All these data indicate that PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) can utilize a larger fraction of solar light that P3HT as a possible material for applications in micrometer response photovoltaic devices.

Let's think step by step.

PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: All these data indicate that PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) can utilize a larger fraction of solar light that P3HT as a possible material for applications in micrometer response photovoltaic devices.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) |
| P3HT |
| solar light |
| larger fraction |
| possible material |
| applications |
| micrometer response photovoltaic devices. |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) |
| P3HT |
| larger fraction of solar light utilization |
| material for applications |
| micrometer response photovoltaic devices |

Note: "PDTP - DTDPP(Bu)" and "P3HT" are materials, but "solar light" is not a property, it is a source of energy. "Larger fraction of solar light utilization" is a property related to the materials' ability to utilize a larger fraction of solar light.
